column2: Improved XmlSerializerUtil#copyBean -- moved type compatibility checks to compile time instead runtime.

column3:
Fixed bug when copying a instance of Base class to a instance of Derived class.
Added XmlSerializerUtil#mergeBeans.
Suppressed some warnings.

Ok, but I didn't find any usage of DeploymentConfigurationBase, it is need?
I find same problem in ServerConfigurationBase and I made simple fix.
I sent new PR #107. I didn't drop the DeploymentConfigurationBase just fixed it, but seems you can do it.
